company_address: Edappally Raghavan Pillai road,, Elamakkara, COCHIN, KERALA, 682026
my_business: At BURO Furniture, we believe that a well-designed workspace fosters productivity, comfort, and success. Specializing in high-quality ergonomic office chairs and furniture, we bring globally sourced products from Malaysia, China, and Vietnam to businesses and professionals across India.
top_product: Our Product Range: ✔ Office Seating – Executive chairs, task chairs, and conference room seating designed for productivity and comfort. ✔ Ergonomic Chairs – Scientifically designed seating solutions that promote posture support and long-hour comfort. ✔ Lounge Seating – Stylish and comfortable seating for reception areas, waiting lounges, and collaborative spaces. ✔ Cafeteria Seating – Functional and modern seating solutions for cafeterias, pantries, and break areas. Whether it's a corporate office, coworking space, or hospitality setup, BURO Furniture ensures the perfect balance of ergonomics, design, and quality.
ideal_referral: We are looking to connect with: ✔ Furniture Dealers – Expand your product range with our premium office chairs. ✔ Architects & Interior Designers – Partner with us to provide ergonomic seating solutions for your projects. ✔ Contractors – Enhance your office and commercial fit-outs with our seating expertise. ✔ Business Owners & Institutions – Setting up a new office or upgrading your workspace? We’ve got the perfect seating solutions for you!
top_problem_solved: Recently, we delivered twenty premium leather chairs to a reputed office in Cochin for their conference room. After installation, the client noticed that the chair handles were getting scratched against the framework of their conference table. While this issue wasn’t directly related to our product, we took it upon ourselves to find a solution. After thorough research, we identified a special accessory that could be used to line the table edges, effectively preventing further damage. This proactive approach reflects BURO Furniture’s commitment to going the extra mile—not just selling furniture but ensuring that it enhances comfort, functionality, and longevity in every workspace.
my_favourite_bni_story: When I joined BNI, I didn’t follow the usual path. Instead of attending the Member Success Program (MSP) first, I jumped straight into the Leadership Training Program—even before fully understanding the dynamics of BNI. It was a bold step, but one that truly shaped my journey here.

my_business: M2i has been a leading player in the Home Automation segment for more than 15 years. We have delivered successful projects to our clients in different parts of Kerala, pioneering and innovating technologically. Some of the home automation work we do can be classified into the following categories:
top_product: Our Home Automation solutions bring unparalleled convenience, comfort, and control to modern living. We specialize in integrating smart technology that allows seamless management of lighting, security, climate, and entertainment systems—all from the touch of a button or a voice command. Whether it’s a luxury villa, an apartment, or a commercial space, our automation systems are designed to enhance energy efficiency, improve safety, and provide a personalized experience. With user-friendly interfaces and advanced technology, we transform everyday spaces into smart, connected environments. For those seeking to upgrade their lifestyle with innovation and ease, our Home Automation solutions are the perfect choice.
ideal_referral: My ideal referrals include Builders and Contractors, Architects, and Interior Companies who seek cutting-edge automation solutions to enhance their projects. I also work closely with Consultants, Electrical Consultants, and professionals involved in new residential and commercial building constructions to bring smart, efficient systems to life. Additionally, I specialize in serving Educational Institutions, Hospitals, and other large-scale facilities looking to upgrade their infrastructure with state-of-the-art automation. NRIs planning to automate their homes or properties are also an excellent fit, as I provide tailored solutions to meet their unique needs. If you know anyone in these categories, I’d be grateful for your referral. Together, let’s make their spaces smarter, more efficient, and future-ready!
top_problem_solved: We provided a cost-effective security and panic alarm solution for Alive Lifespace, an old-age living community, addressing a critical need for enhanced safety and peace of mind. Our solution included strategically integrated panic buttons and advanced alarm systems, ensuring residents could call for immediate assistance during emergencies. The system was designed to be user-friendly, reliable, and tailored to the unique requirements of elderly care. By implementing this solution, we not only improved the security infrastructure but also reinforced the trust and comfort of residents and their families, showcasing our commitment to delivering practical and impactful automation solutions.
my_favourite_bni_story: One of my most cherished BNI stories is about the incredible confidence I gained from the BNI platform. It taught me how to face people with a microphone, share my ideas boldly, and think big. This journey of personal growth and empowerment inspired me to pursue a larger dream—expanding my business to the UAE. Today, I am thrilled to have started a new center in Dubai, a milestone that reflects the encouragement and opportunities I received through BNI. This experience has been a game-changer, reinforcing the belief that with the right platform and mindset, the sky is the limit!

my_business:
Backwater Aquatics: Professional Aquarium Solutions
​Backwater Aquatics specializes in creating and maintaining stunning, healthy aquariums ("aquascapes") for both residential and corporate environments. We eliminate the common frustrations of aquarium ownership—such as algae, sick fish, and complex maintenance—allowing our clients to simply enjoy the beauty and tranquility of a living underwater ecosystem.  
​Our services are divided into two main categories:
​Done-For-You Aquascaping & Maintenance: We offer a complete, hassle-free service that includes custom design, professional installation, and scheduled maintenance. This is ideal for busy homeowners, offices, waiting rooms, and restaurants that want a vibrant "living work of art" without the technical work.
​Online Retail Store: For the dedicated hobbyist, our online store provides a curated selection of high-quality aquascaping supplies, premium plants, and specialized equipment, enabling them to create their own masterpieces.

As the day came to a close, we reflected on our experiences and the positive impact it had on our relationships within the chapter. Members expressed gratitude for the opportunity to connect on a more personal level and remarked on the increased sense of unity and support within the group. my_business:
Sippy C.R. - Global Logistics & Shipping Expert | Tradeo Logistics LLP
Hello BNI Network! I'm Sippy C.R., an MBA and law graduate with 25 years of comprehensive experience in international freight forwarding, shipping, and logistics.
Tradeo Logistics LLP, part of B&C International Logistics Private Limited (HQ in Shenzhen, China and operations in Cochin, India), specializes in imports and exports between China, India, and the rest of the world.
Our services include:
Sea Freight, Airfreight, Courier Shipments
Handling Oversized Cargo, Project Shipments, Special Equipment
Sourcing, Marine Insurance, Marine Litigation
I welcome your freight inquiries and shipping requirements. Expect the best rates and superior service for all your global shipments!
top_product: "Our Top Product is 'Optimized Multimodal Flow,' a bespoke strategy that selects the perfect mix of Air, LCL, and FCL shipments from China to minimize total landed costs and maximize supply chain predictability for the client."
ideal_referral: "My Ideal Referral is a company importing High-Value or Time-Sensitive commodities (e.g., electronics, fashion) from China who requires flexibility. They need a forwarder with the proven ability to seamlessly switch between air freight and ocean freight based on market changes, ensuring consistent delivery dates regardless of volatile shipping rates."
top_problem_solved: "The Top Problem I Solve is the Uncertainty of the China Supply Chain. I eliminate the financial stress and wasted time caused by last-minute price hikes, unexpected port delays, and Customs holds, giving my clients back predictable costs and reliable delivery dates."
my_favourite_bni_story: The recent Onam celebration was truly unforgettable. The energy from the Eternal Head Table and their leadership made the event fantastic, perfectly capturing the spirit of Kerala. It wasn't just the delicious sadya that made it memorable; it was the incredible opportunity to step away from business talk and connect with so many fellow members on a personal level. Seeing the entire leadership team and the chapter bond like a family reinforced exactly why I choose to build my business here. It was connection, not commerce, that made the day a huge success!
